entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App crashes with GetRoute NRE when FlyoutItemIsVisible changes #16940
  • FlyoutPage is not scrollable in MacCatalyst #16938
  • Extend KeyboardAccelerator to all controls #16936
    Backlog
  • I'm encountering issues while using databases like MySQL and MSSQL when running my project on a mobile device. #16934
  • App crashes with ArgumentOutOfRangeException when FlyoutItemIsVisible changes (WinUI only) #16929
    Backlog
  • Shell: Cannot open shell flyout when initial page has Navbar hidden (NavBarIsVisible="False") - Android #16927
  • [regression/not fixed in 8.0.0-rc.1.9012] Binding Issue: Multiple platform CheckBox control 'IsChecked' #16926
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Intermittent "Font not found" crash when temporary location is cleared during runtime #16923
  • [WinUI] Shadows shape is wrong when using clipped image #16922
  • [iOS]Image downscaling makes image layout inconsistent on IOS when compared to Android and non downscaled images #16921
  • Viquloc #16920
  • Handler not set on MAUI Shapes #16919
  • ImageButton is not properly anti-aliased when scaled down #16918
  • The placeholder is displayed incorrectly on iOS and MacCatalyst #16916
    .NET 8 GA
  • Unable to create a maui (v7) app on windows and target iOS #16915
  • Layout issue with Grid columns #16913
  • [iOS] Label's width can't full fill Grid's * (GridUnitType.Star) space when Grid has a Horizontal padding #16912
  • [Windows] ListView cannot bind to ObservableCollection<System.Type> #16911
  • [regression/8.0.0] - RefreshView does not hide spinner when IsRefreshing set to false. #16910
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - Shared ResourceDictionary Styles prevents app from building in android #16908
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Grid RowDefinition height taking precedence over actual Height constraints #16935
  • [8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [Android] DeviceSensors produce an ANR at irregular intervals when built in Release mode. #15829
  • [Bug] Keyboard Bugs and Xamarin.Forms migration concerns #11703
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add TextInput property so users can enable/disable if they want tapping outside on an input field to close the keyboard #12003
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] Unable to use a custom splash screen #16843
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] - WinUI shadows are broken #16094
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI appicon and splash not updating on physical device IPhone 13 - iOS version 16.5.1 #16731
  • SVG file is not converting to PNG properly. #12658
    Backlog
  • SVG Font-family does not apply after convert to png(Splash screen) #16399
  • iOS Simulator not showing up - Log ends with "Deploy: succeeded" #16914
  • [Android] WindowOvelay painting is not working with shell #10781
    Under Consideration
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: Voice over is not announcing label information for slider, increase or decrease button. #15621
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView with BindableLayout.ItemsSource is not recalculate new size on iOS #12727
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.81] ScrollView content with Buttons rendered offscreen do not respond on iOS #14624
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView with dynamically added Entries are not clickable #15762
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix so updating FlyoutItemIsVisible hides/shows shell menu item #16942
  • [android] Fixed ListView visibility and opacity on Android #16941
  • [UITest] Add a timeout to the appium server startup #16939
    area/testing
  • [workload] Only install the WinUI pack on Windows #16937
    area/setup 🪄
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    .NET 8 GA
  • Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    community ✨
  • [uitests] Bump versions and fix script #16917

Merged

  • Improve VisualElement API Docs Follow-up #16933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    t/breaking 💥, area/keyboard, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 8 GA
  • Update VisualElement docs #16754
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Improve the control over resource generation #16845
    .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16907
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Update shadow mask as part of shadow properties #16895
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fail the build before it even starts #16906
  • [net7.0] [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #16902
  • Fix support for VisualDiagnosticsOverlay/IWindowOverlay on Android Shell Apps #16138
    platform/android 🤖, area/tooling ⚙️, area/shell 🐢, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Updates for dotnet/runtime #16904
    .NET 8 GA
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Handlers should not implement `IImageSourcePartSetter` directly #16901
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #16842
    partner/cat 😻, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
